title: PrincipalRoleRevokedEvent
description: Event published when a role is revoked from a principal (service account) in the IAM service.

bindingId.description: The unique identifier of the role binding that was revoked.

principalId.description: The unique identifier of the principal.

roleId.description: The unique identifier of the role.

revokedAt.description: The timestamp when the role was revoked.
